Blade Dancer.card_desc: [Whirl] Increase the travel distance of Whirl by {scale=8|8}%.

Embers.card_desc: [Billow] Regenerate 2 Ammo every 0.5s for {scale=0.5|0.5}s after activating Billow.

Fan the Flames.card_desc: [Billow] Reduce the Cooldown of Billow by {scale=20|20}% after getting a Killing Blow.

Footwork.card_desc: [Counter] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 3s after activating Counter.

Fuel for the Fire.card_desc: [Whirl] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=5|5}% for 2s after using Whirl.

Guillotine.card_desc: [Spite] Spite deals 25% of its target's maximum Health with each hit and grants you Damage Immunity for its duration. Increases your Ultimate charge rate by 15%.

Heartless.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 4s after getting a Killing Blow.

Hideout.card_desc: [Billow] Reduce the Cooldown of Whirl by {scale=1|1}s after using Billow.

Master Stance.card_desc: [Counter] Reduce the Cooldown of Whirl by {scale=1|1}s after successfully hitting an enemy with Counter.

Smolder.card_desc: [Billow] Heal for 25% of your maximum Health per second while using Billow.

Up in Smoke.card_desc: [Billow] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% while Billow is active.

Viciousness.card_desc: [Counter] Reduce the Cooldown of Counter by {scale=15|15}% after successfully hitting an enemy with Counter.

Wildfire.card_desc: [Whirl] Reduce the Cooldown of Whirl by {scale=0.5|0.5}s for each enemy it hits.

Yomi.card_desc: [Weapon] Your heavy hit with Inferno Blade deals an additional 150 damage.

Asche.card_desc: [Rauchschwaden] Nach Aktivierung von Rauchschwaden werden {scale=0.5|0.5}s lang alle 0,5s 2 Munition erzeugt.

Beinarbeit.card_desc: [Konter] Nach Aktivierung von Konter erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

B\u00f6sartigkeit.card_desc: [Konter] Erfolgreiche Konter reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Konter um {scale=15|15}%.

Brennstoff.card_desc: [Wirbel] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach dem Ende von Wirbel 2s lang um {scale=5|5}%.

Feuer entfachen.card_desc: [Rauchschwaden] Todesstöße reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Rauchschwaden um {scale=20|20}%.

Guillotine.card_desc: [Bosheit] Bosheit fügt dem Ziel mit jedem Treffer 25% dessen maximaler Gesundheit als Schaden zu und gewährt dir Immunität gegen Schaden. Deine Überkraft lädt 15% schneller auf.

Herzlos.card_desc: [Rüstung] Todesstöße erhöhen dein Lauftempo 4s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Infamie.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Klingentanz.card_desc: [Wirbel] Erhöht die Reichweite von Wirbel um {scale=8|8}%.

Meisterhaltung.card_desc: [Konter] Erfolgreiche Konter reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Wirbel um {scale=1|1}s.

Perfekter Block.card_desc: [Konter] Nach Verwendung von Konter wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Schwelendes Feuer.card_desc: [Rauchschwaden] Während der Dauer von Rauchschwaden wirst du pro Sekunde um 25% deiner maximalen LP geheilt.

Span.card_desc: [Wirbel] Nach Aktivierung von Wirbel wird {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

Verpufft.card_desc: [Rauchschwaden] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während Rauchschwaden um {scale=8|8}%.

Versteck.card_desc: [Rauchschwaden] Nach Verwendung von Rauchschwaden reduziert sich die Abklingzeit von Wirbel um {scale=1|1}s.

Wildfeuer.card_desc: [Wirbel] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Wirbel pro getroffenem Gegner um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Yomi.card_desc: [Waffe] Deine starken Schwertschwünge verursachen 150 Schaden zusätzlich.

Attise-flammes.card_desc: [Volute de fumée] Chaque exécution réduit le temps de recharge de Volute de fumée de {scale=20|20}%.

Cachette.card_desc: [Volute de fumée] Le temps de recharge de Tourbillon diminue de {scale=1|1}s à l'activation de Volute de fumée.

Charbons ardents.card_desc: [Volute de fumée] Vous regagnez 2 munitions toutes les 0,5s pendant {scale=0.5|0.5} après l'activation de Volute de fumée.

Cruaut\u00e9.card_desc: [Contre] Toucher un ennemi avec Contre réduit son temps de recharge de {scale=15|15}%.

Danse tranchante.card_desc: [Tourbillon] La distance de Tourbillon augmente de {scale=8|8}%.

En cendres.card_desc: [Volute de fumée] Vous regagnez 25% de vos PV max. par seconde pendant Volute de fumée.

\u00c9vanescent.card_desc: [Volute de fumée] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=8|8}% pendant Volute de fumée.

Feu mal\u00e9fique.card_desc: [Tourbillon] Le temps de recharge de Tourbillon diminue de {scale=0.5|0.5}s par ennemi touché.

Guillotine.card_desc: [Malveillance] Pendant Malveillance, vous êtes immunisé aux dégâts et chaque coup retire 25% des PV max. La vitesse de chargement augmente de 15%.

Impitoyable.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque exécution augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 4s.

Incendiaire.card_desc: [Tourbillon] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=5|5}% pendant 2s après Tourbillon.

Jeu de jambes.card_desc: [Contre] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}% pendant 3s après l'activation de Contre.

Malfaisance.card_desc: [Armure] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Posture de ma\u00eetre.card_desc: [Contre] Toucher un ennemi avec Contre réduit le temps de recharge de Tourbillon de {scale=1|1}s.

Yomi.card_desc: [Arme/Armure] Votre troisième tir d'arme inflige 150 dégâts supplémentaires.

\u4f59\u70ec.card_desc: [消散] 激活消散时回复{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u5251\u672f\u5927\u5e08.card_desc: [反击] 反击的持续时间提高{scale=0.25|0.25}秒

\u58f0\u540d\u72fc\u85c9.card_desc: [护甲] 最大生命值提高{scale=50|50}点

\u5b8c\u7f8e\u683c\u6321.card_desc: [反击] 成功反击后回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u5e7d\u51a5.card_desc: [武器] 普通攻击第三下重攻击会穿过敌人，造成150点额外伤害，且没有距离限制

\u65a9\u9996\u4e4b\u5251.card_desc: [业火连斩] 业火连斩的充能速度提升{scale=12.75|.75}%，且每次攻击造成目标最大生命值25%的伤害。攻击期间烬可以免疫伤害

\u65e0\u5fc3.card_desc: [护甲] 获得击杀时移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续4秒

\u706b\u4e0a\u6d47\u6cb9.card_desc: [烈焰旋风] 使用烈焰旋风之后获得{scale=5|5}%生命偷取，持续2秒

\u70c8\u7130\u65cb\u98ce.card_desc: [烈焰旋风] 烈焰旋风的行进距离提高{scale=10|10}%

\u717d\u98ce\u70b9\u706b.card_desc: [消散] 获得击杀时消散的冷却时间降低{scale=20|20}%

\u72c2\u91ce\u4e4b\u706b.card_desc: [烈焰旋风] 每命中一个敌人，烈焰旋风的冷却时间就会降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u7f25\u7f08\u4e4b\u70df.card_desc: [消散] 消散期间的移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%

\u8ff7\u8e2a\u6b65.card_desc: [反击] 使用反击后3秒内，移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%

\u90aa\u5ff5.card_desc: [反击] 成功反击后回复{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u95f7\u71c3.card_desc: [消散] 消散期间每秒回复20%最大生命值

\u9690\u533f\u4e4b\u706b.card_desc: [消散] 消散的持续时间提高{scale=0.4|0.4}秒

\u9ed1\u6697\u706b\u79cd.card_desc: [烈焰旋风] 使用烈焰旋风后获得{scale=1|1}发弹药

Agilidad.card_desc: [Contraataque] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 3s tras activar Contraataque.

Ardor.card_desc: [Avance neblinoso] Te curas un 25% de tu salud máxima mientras usas Avance neblinoso.

Aroma de drag\u00f3n.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu cantidad de munición máxima aumenta en {scale=1|1}.

Baile de cuchillas.card_desc: [Vórtice] La distancia que recorre Vórtice aumenta un {scale=8|8}%.

Bloqueo perfecto.card_desc: [Contraataque] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS tras usar Contraataque.

Brasas.card_desc: [Ciclón] Recuperas 2 de munición cada 0,5s durante {scale=0.5|0.5}s tras activar Ciclón.

Combustible.card_desc: [Vórtice] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=5|5}% durante 2s tras usar Vórtice.

Cruel.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 4s tras asestar un golpe de gracia.

Echar le\u00f1a al fuego.card_desc: [Avance neblinoso] Se reduce la recarga de Avance neblinoso un {scale=20|20}% tras asestar un golpe de gracia.

En llamas.card_desc: [Ciclón] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% mientras esté activa Ciclón.

Escondite.card_desc: [Avance neblinoso] Se reduce la recarga de Vórtice en {scale=1|1}s tras usar Avance neblinoso.

Feroz.card_desc: [Contraataque] Se reduce la recarga de Contraataque un {scale=15|15}% tras acertar un golpe con Contraataque.

Guillotina.card_desc: [Rencor] Rencor inflige como daño un 25% de la salud máxima del objetivo con cada disparo y te otorga inmunidad al daño mientras dure. También aumenta la tasa de recarga de tu habilidad definitiva un 15%.

Incendio.card_desc: [Vórtice] Se reduce la recarga de Vórtice en {scale=0.5|0.5}s por cada enemigo atravesado.

Infamia.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Le\u00f1a.card_desc: [Vórtice] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición tras activar Vórtice.

Malicia.card_desc: [Arma] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=10|10}%.

Postura de maestr\u00eda.card_desc: [Contraataque] Se reduce la recarga de Vórtice en {scale=1|1}s tras acertar un golpe con Contraataque.

Yomi.card_desc: [Arma] Tu ataque pesado con Espada infernal 150 PS de daño adicionales.

Acendedor.card_desc: [Giro] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição ao ativar o Giro.

Agressividade.card_desc: [Revide] Reduz o intervalo do Revide em {scale=15|15}% ao atingir o inimigo com Revide.

Bloqueio Perfeito.card_desc: [Revide] Você se cura em {scale=100|100} de vida após usar o Revide.

Brasas.card_desc: [Névoa] Regenera 2 de munição a cada 0,5s por {scale=0.5|0.5}s após ativar Névoa.

Dan\u00e7arino da L\u00e2mina.card_desc: [Giro] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% a distância percorrida pelo Giro.

Defumado.card_desc: [Névoa] Cura em 25% da sua vida máxima por segundo enquanto durar a Névoa.

Esconderijo.card_desc: [Névoa] Reduz o intervalo do Giro em {scale=1|1}s após usar a Névoa.

F\u00e3 do Fogo.card_desc: [Névoa] Reduz o intervalo da Névoa em {scale=20|20}% após dar o disparo fatal.

Fogo Selvagem.card_desc: [Giro] Reduz o intervalo do Giro em {scale=0.5|0.5}s a cada inimigo atingido por ele.

Gasolina no Fogo.card_desc: [Whirl] Ganha {scale=5|5}% mais velocidade de movimento por 2s após usar Giro.

Guilhotina.card_desc: [Agressão] Agressão causa dano de 25% da vida máxima do alvo a cada acerto e concede imunidade a dano pela duração. A taxa de recarga da suprema aumenta em 15%.

Inf\u00e2mia.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Mal\u00edcia.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a velocidade em que recarrega a arma.

\u00d3leo de Drag\u00e3o.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=1|1} a sua munição máxima.

P\u00e9s Ligeiros.card_desc: [Revide] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% sua velocidade de movimento por 3s após ativar Revide.

Pose de Mestre.card_desc: [Revide] Reduz o intervalo do Giro em {scale=1|1}s ao atingir o inimigo com Revide.

Sem Cora\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% por 4s após dar o disparo fatal em um inimigo.

Virou Fuma\u00e7a.card_desc: [Névoa] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=8|8}% enquanto a Névoa estiver ativa.

Yomi.card_desc: [Arma] O golpe mais poderoso da sua Lâmina Infernal causa 150 mais dano.

\u0411\u0435\u0437\u0436\u0430\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=10|10}% на 4 с. после нанесения смертельного удара.

\u0411\u0435\u0441\u0447\u0435\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0413\u0438\u043b\u044c\u043e\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Неприязнь] Неприязнь наносит урон в размере 25% от максимального здоровья цели за попадание и сокращает перезарядку суперудара на 15%. Пока действует Неприязнь, вы не получаете урона.

\u0414\u0438\u043a\u0438\u0439 \u043e\u0.card_desc: [Вихрь] Попадания Вихрем сокращают его перезарядку на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0414\u0440\u0430\u043a\u043e\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш максимальный боезапас повышается на {scale=1|1} ед.

\u0401\u043c\u0438.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваша мощная атака Адским клинком наносит на 150 ед. больше урона.

\u0417\u043e\u043b\u0430.card_desc: [Облако дыма] После активации Облака дыма вы генерируете 2 ед. боеприпасов каждые 0,5 с. в течение {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0418\u0433\u0440\u0430 \u0441 \u043e\u.card_desc: [Облако дыма] Перезарядка Облака дыма сокращается на {scale=20|20}% после нанесения смертельного удара.

\u0418\u0434\u0435\u0430\u043b\u044c\u04.card_desc: [Контратака] После использования контратаки вы исцеляетесь на {scale=100|100}.

\u041a\u043b\u0443\u0431\u044b \u0434\u0.card_desc: [Облако дыма] Пока действует Облако дыма, ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=8|8}%.

\u041f\u043e\u0440\u043e\u0447\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Контратака] Попадания по врагам Контратакой сокращают ее перезарядку на {scale=15|15}%.

\u0420\u0430\u0431\u043e\u0442\u0430 \u0.card_desc: [Контратака] Активация Контратаки повышает вашу скорость передвижения на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

\u0421\u0442\u043e\u0439\u043a\u0430 \u0.card_desc: [Контратака] Попадания Контратакой сокращают перезарядку Вихря на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0422\u043b\u0435\u044e\u0449\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Облако дыма] Используя Облако дыма, вы исцеляетесь на 25% от вашего максимального здоровья в секунду.

\u0422\u043e\u043f\u043b\u0438\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Вихрь] Скорость движения по окончании действия Вихря повышается на {scale=5|5}% на 2 с.

\u0423\u0431\u0435\u0436\u0438\u0449\u04.card_desc: [Облако дыма] Применение Облака дыма сокращает перезарядку Вихря на {scale=1|1} с.

Dym.card_desc: [Kłąb dymu] Przywraca ci 25% maks. zdrowia na sekundę, jak długo używasz Kłębu dymu.

Gilotyna.card_desc: [Złośliwość] Złośliwość zadaje obrażenia w wysokości 25% maks. zdrowia celu przy trafieniu i zapewnia ci odporność na obrażenia na czas swego trwania. Zwiększa szybkość ładowania arcyzdolności o 15%.

Infamia.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Kryj\u00f3wka.card_desc: [Kłąb dymu] Skraca czas odnowienia Wiru o {scale=1|1} s po użyciu Wiru.

Manewry.card_desc: [Kontra] Aktywacja Kontry zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 3 s.

Mistrzowska postawa.card_desc: [Kontra] Udane trafienie Kontrą skraca czas odnowienia Wiru o {scale=1|1} s.

Okrucie\u0144stwo.card_desc: [Kontra] Udane trafienie wroga Kontrą skraca czas odnowienia Kontry o {scale=15|15}%.

Okrutnik.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 4 s po zadaniu Zabójczego ciosu.

Oliwa do ognia.card_desc: [Wir] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=5|5}% na 2 s po użyciu Wiru.

Perfekcyjny blok.card_desc: [Kontra] Przywraca ci {scale=100|100} PZ po użyciu Kontry.

Po\u017coga.card_desc: [Wir] Skraca czas odnowienia Wiru o {scale=0.5|0.5} s za każde trafienie wroga.

Rozniecenie.card_desc: [Kłąb dymu] Skraca czas odnowienia Kłębu dymu o {scale=20|20}% po zadaniu Zabójczego ciosu.

Tancerz mieczy.card_desc: [Wir] Zwiększa dystans pokonany przez Wir o {scale=8|8}%.

Yomi.card_desc: [Broń] Twój mocny cios Piekielnym ostrzem zadaje 150 dodatkowych obrażeń.

Zarzewie.card_desc: [Kłąb dymu] Przywraca 2 szt. amunicji co 0,5 s przez {scale=0.5|0.5} s po aktywacji Kłębu dymu.

Zwidy.card_desc: [Kłąb dymu] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% podczas trwania Kłębu dymu.

Ahlaks\u0131zl\u0131k.card_desc: [Karşılık Ver] Karşılık Ver ile bir düşmanı başarılıyla vurmak Karşılık Ver'in Bekleme Süresini %{scale=15|15}sn azaltır.

Alevi Yelle.card_desc: [Dalga] Bir Öldürücü Darbe vurduktan sonra Dalga'nın Bekleme Süresini %{scale=20|20} azalt.

Ate\u015f Yak\u0131t\u0131.card_desc: [Burgaç] Burgaç kullandıktan sonra 2sn boyunca Hareket Hızını %{scale=5|5} artır.

Ayak Hakimiyeti.card_desc: [Karşılık Ver] Karşılık Ver'i etkinleştirdikten sonra Hareket Hızını 3sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

Dumans\u0131z Ate\u015f.card_desc: [Dalga] Dalga kullanırken her saniye maksimum Canının %25'i kadar iyileş.

Giyotin.card_desc: [Kin] Kin her vuruşunda hedefin maksimum Canının %25'i kadar hasar verir ve süresi boyunca sana Hasar dokunulmazlığı verir. Ayrıca Ulti dolum hızını %15 artırır.

Kalpsiz.card_desc: [Zırh] Bir Öldürücü Darbe vurduktan sonra Hareket Hızını 4sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

K\u00f6z.card_desc: [Dalga] Dalga'yı etkinleştirdikten sonra {scale=0.5|0.5}sn boyunca her 0,5 saniyede 2 Cephane oluştur.

M\u00fckemmel Engelleme.card_desc: [Karşılık Ver] Karşılık Ver kullandıktan sonra {scale=100|100} Can İyileş.

S\u0131\u011f\u0131nak.card_desc: [Dalga] Dalga kullandıktan sonra Burgaç'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1}sn azalt.

Usta Duru\u015fu.card_desc: [Karşılık Ver] Karşılık Ver ile bir düşmanı başarıyla vurmak Burgaç'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1}sn azaltır.

Vah\u015fi Ate\u015f.card_desc: [Burgaç] Vurduğu her düşman için Burgaç'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.

Yomi.card_desc: [Silah] Cehennem Kılıcı ile yaptığın ağır vuruş 150 ek hasar verir.
